title: Russia censored internet news sources as rebellion rumors flew
description: The speed with which Russia moved to block content related to Wagner showed a substantial increase in the country’s ability to control what news its residents have access to.

title: Firouz Naderi, NASA official who put rovers on Mars, dies at 77
description: The missions he led vastly expanded human understanding of the Red Planet and made him a hero to fellow Iranian Americans.

title: The Elonization of Mark Zuckerberg: How the Meta CEO is playing it cool
description: Mark Zuckerberg is trying to make himself more relevant to the tech elite.
